T02TD1599AE:117a-0: @117a pha ga mo'i srung ba'i 'khor lo la /
T02TD1599AE:117a-1: zangs gzhong gi nang du rang byung gi khrag dang /
T02TD1599AE:117a-2: dngul chu zangs rdog ma gcig gis zhag par mnye /
T02TD1599AE:117a-3: de thang ba'i zur gyi grvar btsir la /
T02TD1599AE:117a-4: zhu ba de zangs srab mo'am gro ga la sogs pa la 'khor lo ji lta ba bzhin du bris /
T02TD1599AE:117a-5: de la rab gnas byas te snyim par bcug la /
T02TD1599AE:117a-6: phag mo'i rkang pa brgyad pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la dril nas /
T02TD1599AE:117a-7: sngar btsir ba'i tshigs mas rab byung yin na thang ba'i zur du gtums la phrag pa g-yon par bkal /
T02TD1599AE:117a-8: skra can yin na gong ba g-yon par gtum mo //
T02TD1599AE:117a-9: drag po mngon spyod kyi las la ;
T02TD1599AE:117a-10: gzhung nas byung ba ltar gzugs brnyan byas te /
T02TD1599AE:117a-12: rang gi sngas su drag po'i thab khung gru gsum pa gcig bru /
T02TD1599AE:117a-13: de tsher ma can gyi shing la dur khrod kyi sol dum gyi me sbar ba dang /
T02TD1599AE:117a-14: gzugs brnyan de lcags kyi skam pas bzung ste /
T02TD1599AE:117a-15: dmar lhang gis ma song bar du bsro'o //
T02TD1599AE:117a-16: de ltar song ba dang dug gi chu'am bong bu'i chus bsad la /
T02TD1599AE:117a-17: de dong du bcug nas g-yom pa la phag mo'i 'khor lo bris pa gcig gis kha bcad /
T02TD1599AE:117a-19: ling ga yang dang yang du bsro zhing bsgrub /
T02TD1599AE:117a-20: bsad pa'i sngags go cha'i lha mo'i sngags la m'a ra ya btags shing bzlas so //
T02TD1599AE:117a-21: sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang /
T02TD1599AE:117a-22: de nas sgrub pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1599AE:117a-23: de la bsnyen pa ni gnas dben pas stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02TD1599AE:117a-24: gtor ma la sogs pa bshams la /
T02TD1599AE:117b-0: dang por tshogs bsags pa'i phyir phyag 'tshal ba @117b nas dge ba'i rtsa ba yan chod bya /
T02TD1599AE:117b-1: de nas skad cig gis rang bcom ldan 'das mar bskyed /
T02TD1599AE:117b-2: snying gnas 'od zer spros la ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bya /
T02TD1599AE:117b-3: gnyis su med pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma gsal bar bsgom /
T02TD1599AE:117b-4: yi ge gsum gyis lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab /
T02TD1599AE:117b-6: ma 'byor na ting nge 'dzin gyis mchod pa bya /
T02TD1599AE:117b-7: de nas ting nge 'dzin dang ma bral bar bzlas pa thun re la nyis stong re bya /
T02TD1599AE:117b-8: zhag gcig la bzhi'am lngar bsgom /
T02TD1599AE:117b-9: bzlas pa 'bum bzlas pa'i tshe bsnyen pa rdzogs so //
T02TD1599AE:117b-10: sgrub pa ni dang po bum pa dang rnam lnga dang gtor ma gtsang ma gang bar bsham /
T02TD1599AE:117b-11: khye'u'am bu mo gtsang ma sngar nas nyer bsngogs bya /
T02TD1599AE:117b-13: kha zas bzang pos tshim bar bya /
T02TD1599AE:117b-14: bum pa sbos chu gtsang mas dgang /
T02TD1599AE:117b-15: de'i nang du skad cig gis lha mor bskyed /
T02TD1599AE:117b-16: ye shes pa dgug gzhug bya /
T02TD1599AE:117b-17: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab /
T02TD1599AE:117b-19: de 'od du zhu ba las bdud rtsir gyur par bsam /
T02TD1599AE:117b-20: de nas skad cig gis bdag nyid lha mor bskyed /
T02TD1599AE:117b-22: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab /
T02TD1599AE:117b-24: de nas khye'u'am bu mo skad cig gis lha mor bskyed /
T02TD1599AE:117b-26: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab /
T02TD1599AE:117b-28: de nas rtsa ba'i lha mor bsams la /
T02TD1599AE:117b-29: gnas gsum la mchod pa dbul /
T02TD1599AE:117b-30: de nas snod la chags pa'i dud pas snag tsha byas te mthe bong bsku /
T02TD1599AE:117b-31: de nas mthe bong gi rtsa mtheb 'dzub [?] gnyis kyis bzung la /
T02TD1599AE:117b-33: khye'u'am bu mo mthe bong blta ru gzhug cing /
T02TD1599AE:117b-34: ji ltar mthong ba bzhin smra ru gzhug ;
T02TD1599AE:117b-35: aom hrim hrim khrim khrim khyum khyum dha na h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1599AE:117b-36: zhes pa rdo rje phag mo'i pra brtag pa rdzogs so//
